charges.charge_description: 21 USC 841(a)(1) POSSESSION OF SCHEDULE II CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE OR DISPENSE-COCAINE (1)

charges.charge_disposition: 120 months imprisonment, 5 yrs supervised release, $100 special assessment, 60 months imprisonment consecutive, 3 yrs supervised rls, $100 special assessment (1)

charges.charge_description: 18 USC 924(c) POSSESSION OF FIREARM DURING/IN RELATION TO A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME (2)

charges.charge_disposition: 120 months imprisonment, 5 yrs supervised release, $100 special assessment, 60 months imprisonment consecutive, 3 yrs supervised rls, $100 special assessment (2)
